question: Which of the following is not a Semi Luxury Tourist Train in India?
explanation: Tiger Express is a semi-luxury train in India. It has been started in collaboration between the Railways and Indian Railway Catering and Tourism Corporation (IRCTC). It will take the tourist from travellers to the world-famous Bandhavgarh and Kanha National Parks in Madhya Pradesh. Desert Circuit and Heritage Circuit are two other semi-luxury tourist trains. The Golden Chariot is a luxury tourist train that connects the important tourist spots in the Indian states of Karnataka, Goa, Kerala, and Tamil Nadu & Pondicherry. It is named after the Stone Chariot in the Vitthala Temple at Hampi.
